body:
Hey Guys,
I know I had made a post saying that I will post videos but sadly I haven't. I hopefully will start to record in the near future. I just need to learn how to use Adobe Premiere Pro. So I have created two preliminary videos and I would love feedback. I know these aren't the best and are a bit rough on the edges, but I did this all in around 30 minutes total. Enjoy! 

- SenseiTechUS, a nub

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1y4F0vIFSDY

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rqXSOxnlhks

Edit: Totally forgot about sound, sorry about that xP

title: Preliminary Videos (Feedback Wanted)

replies.body: For some reason, I cant embed youtube videos so here are some links
replies.body_tagged: For some reason, I cant embed youtube videos so here are some links

replies.body:
Did you pay for adobe premiere pro?

And both look pretty nice :)
BUT
Recommendation: Don't take out the black side tiles at the end of the vid. Ruins the quality a bit :|
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
The black bars are going to be for cinematic intros that will be in the beginning of the vid, not throughout the whole entire video, it will look better on a final video.

Suuuuuuuure, I paid for it :)
